original_text: And Nathan said to the king, Go, do all that is in thine heart; for the Lord is with thee.
korean_text: 나단이 왕께 아뢰되 여호와께서 왕과 함께 계시니 마음에 있는 모든 것을 행하소서 하니라

sentences.original_text: And Nathan said to the king
Go, do all that is in thine heart
sentences.korean_translation: 가서 네 마음에 있는 모든 것을 행하라

sentences.original_text: for the Lord is with thee
